body.p: I have just received your favor, and will attend today to the shipment of the books.

Geo. F. Barth Esq. a gentleman of this city, elected Magistrate at the Election on Monday, wishes to receive the appointment of Notary Public. If convenient please see the Secretary of State and obtain a temporary appointment, and address the same to me.

Very Truly
Your friend
Oliver Lucas
Col. R. R. Bolling

Please issue a Comission to S. L. Ewing as Notary public for Jefferson Co I know Mr. L. to be a highly honorable gentleman and with all a true union man. Please hand the Commissions to me & I will pay fees
